mapper.select: select boardNumber, boardTitle, boardContent, userId, boardDate, readCount from tbl_board b join tbl_user u on b.userNumber = u.userNumber order by 1 desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select boardNumber from tbl_board order by 1 desc limit 0, 1;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (boardTitle, boardContent, userNumber, boardDate) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userNumber}, now())
mapper.select: select replyNumber, boardNumber, r.userNumber, userId, replyContent from tbl_reply r join tbl_user u on r.userNumber = u.userNumber and boardNumber = #{boardNumber} order by 1 desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (boardNumber, userNumber, replyContent) values(#{boardNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{replyContent})
